name: Stick To It!
description:
Created for Pursuing Pixels Game Jam

godiPONG's second game - Stick To It!

You will play as a stick figure trying to make their way through various levels scribbled in a notebook.

You have control over your own platforms! Draw whatever you want, but make sure to watch the amount of ink you have left.

Levels are split into 4 phases. Each phase adds obstacles for you to get around. However, the drawings you made in the previous phase carry on into the new phase, so draw wisely!

Controls:

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

- Mouse to draw

- P to reset current Phase

- L to reset current Level

- 1, 2, 3, 4 to view the corresponding phase's map
